message: I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product at a competitive price. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8200. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9000. It's a fair price that balances the value you see in the product with my target profit.
